name: EST (Black Case)
description:
Awaking in a mysterious dimension of endless hallways, Est must run forward for the hope of escape.

Meet Daisy during your venture!

& look for secret hidden areas! (You may find a secret ending)

GAME BACKSTORY:

Est is the first game I've ever developed and documented on YouTube. In my eyes, this game is somewhat like a prototype for a demo for a much larger game lol. There may indeed be jank littered throughout, but regardless I'm still proud of what I learned and ultimately becoming someone who can say they are now officially a game developer. I hope you can enjoy what I managed to throw together and of course, all feedback is welcomed, even if it's you roasting the game :) 

If you're interested at all in what my next project may become, please feel free to subscribe to my YouTube channel and help grow the community over there. 

https://youtube.com/@blackcasegames

Thank you for your time!
